DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label , single-arm , Phase IIIb study evaluate safety tolerability pertuzumab combination trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) taxane ( docetaxel , paclitaxel nab-paclitaxel ) first-line treatment participant metastatic locally recurrent HER2-positive breast cancer . Participants receive pertuzumab intravenously ( IV ) trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) IV plus taxane cycle 3 week predefined study end , unacceptable toxicity , withdrawal consent , disease progression , death , whichever occur first .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Pertuzumab Combination With Trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) Taxane First-Line Treatment Participants With Human Epidermal Growth Factor 2 ( HER2 ) -Positive Advanced Breast Cancer ( PERUSE )
